question: what is bignalytics
answer:
What is bignalytics  
Bignalytics is a premier training institute founded in 2019 by IITians and PhD professionals with over 20 years of experience in the IT industry. It is dedicated to bridging the gap between academic knowledge and real-world industry demands by offering comprehensive courses designed to equip students with practical skills and expertise.  
Program formats  
The institute provides programs in both classroom and online formats, focusing on hands-on training and industry-relevant knowledge. This approach ensures learners are prepared to excel in the fast-evolving technological landscape.  
Specializations  
Bignalytics specializes in high-demand fields, including  
 Data analytics  
 Data science  
 Machine learning  
 Artificial intelligence  
Career advancement  
By joining Bignalytics, students can take the next step in their careers and unlock their potential in AI and machine learning.  
For more details, visit their website httpsbignalytics.in.

question: where is location of bignalytics
answer:
Location of bignalytics  
Bignalytics is located at 204, Pearl Business Park, 3-Vishnupuri, iBus Stop, Above Ramesh Dosa, Bhawarkua Main Road, Indore, Madhya Pradesh.

question: what is bignalytics
answer:
Bignalytics is a premier training institute founded in 2019 by IITians and PhD professionals with over 20 years of experience in the IT industry. It is dedicated to bridging the gap between academic knowledge and real-world industry demands by offering comprehensive courses in high-demand fields.  

The institute provides practical, hands-on training through both classroom and online formats, ensuring learners gain industry-relevant skills. Courses focus on areas such as:  
• Data analytics  
• Data science  
• Machine learning  
• Artificial intelligence  

Bignalytics equips students with the expertise needed to succeed in today's fast-evolving technological landscape. To learn more, visit their website at https://bignalytics.in/.
